Name: Toxic
Mod: Monster has augmented Poison powers

Name: Chaosweaver
Mod: Monster is imbued with Chaos Damage and Resistance

Name: Frostweaver
Mod: Monster is imbued with Cold Damage and Resistance

Name: Permafrost
Mod: Monster has augmented Freeze and Chill powers

Name: Hasted
Mod: Monster is faster

Name: Deadeye
Mod: Monster is Accurate and applies Marks

Name: Bombardier
Mod: Monster has augmented Projectile powers and periodically unleashes a barrage of mortars

Name: Flameweaver
Mod: Monster is imbued with Fire Damage and Resistance

Name: Incendiary
Mod: Monster has augmented Ignite powers

Name: Arcane Buffer
Mod: Monster has augmented Energy Shield powers and releases a stunning nova when Energy Shield breaks

Name: Echoist
Mod: Monster repeats skills additional times

Name: Stormweaver
Mod: Monster is imbued with Lightning Damage and Resistance

Name: Dynamo
Mod: Monster has augmented Shock powers

Name: Bonebreaker
Mod: Monster has augmented Stun powers. Monster hits are slower and can't be evaded

Name: Bloodletter
Mod: Monster has augmented Bleed powers. Monster Maims nearby enemies
Effect: Items dropped from the Monster and its Minions are Corrupted

Name: Steel-infused
Mod: Monster is imbued with Physical Damage and Physical Damage Reduction

Name: Gargantuan
Mod: Monster is massive, granting more Life, Area of Effect, and Damage

Name: Berserker
Mod: Monster Enrages as it loses life

Name: Sentinel
Mod: Monster is imbued with Block and Spell Block. Monster Triggers Reckoning when hit

Name: Juggernaut
Mod: Monster cannot be Slowed or Stunned. Monster gains Endurance Charges

Name: Vampiric
Mod: Monster has augmented Life Leech powers

Name: Overcharged
Mod: Monster grants Charges to itself and Allies over time

Name: Soul Conduit
Mod: On death, Monster and nearby Allies are revived

Name: Opulent
Mod: Monster is fabulously wealthy

Name: Malediction
Mod: Monster has a weakening Aura

Name: Consecrator
Mod: Monster periodically creates Consecrated Ground, healing allies and making them immune to curses and ailments

Name: Frenzied
Mod: Monster and allies periodically Enrage

Name: Heralding Minions
Mod: Monster's minions summon invulnerable Lightning Totems on death

Name: Empowering Minions
Mod: Monster's minions are empowered. Minions empower the Monster with additional modifiers on death

Name: Assassin
Mod: Monster has augmented Critical powers and has Shroud Walker

Name: Trickster
Mod: Monster has damage avoidance. Monster periodically Flees

Name: Necromancer
Mod: Monster can raise Undead. Minions are empowered and revive shortly after dying
Effect: Rewards are rolled 2 additional times, choosing the rarest result

Name: Rejuvenating
Mod: Monster has Life Regeneration. Periodically releases a wave that heals nearby allies and prevents enemy Life and Energy Shield recovery
Effect: Rewards are rolled 1 additional time, choosing the rarest result

Name: Executioner
Mod: Monster gains Damage based on missing enemy Life. Monster has an aura that prevents enemies recovering Life and Energy Shield above 50%

Name: Hexer
Mod: Monster is Hexproof. Monster is followed by a Hexing Effigy that creates Hexing areas

Name: Drought Bringer
Mod: Monster disables Flask effects on hit. Monster has an aura that drains Flask charges and prevents gaining Flask charges

Name: Entangler
Mod: Monster creates Thorned Vines that slow and deal Chaos Damage over time.

Name: Temporal Bubble
Mod: Monster is protected by a Temporal Bubble that severely slows those in it and cannot be damaged by those outside of it

Name: Treant Horde
Mod: Monster's minions are replaced with powerful Treants. Some Damage taken from the monster is split between the Treants
Effect: Monster's Minions drop a randomly-chosen Reward Type

Name: Frost Strider
Mod: Monster leaves Chilling Ground in its wake. Minions create Frost Bearers on death

Name: Ice Prison
Mod: Monster periodically entraps players in a cage of ice
Effect: Rewards are rolled 1 additional time, choosing the rarest result

Name: Soul Eater
Mod: Monster empowers when nearby allies die. Periodically summons Phantasms

Name: Flame Strider
Mod: Monster leaves Burning Ground in its wake. Minions create Flame Bearers on death

Name: Corpse Detonator
Mod: Monster detonates nearby Corpses. Monster periodically creates Corpses

Name: Evocationist
Mod: Monster is imbued with Elemental Damage, Resistances and Ailments

Name: Magma Barrier
Mod: Monster is protected by a Magmatic shield that explodes when depleted. Monster periodically creates Volatile Flamebloods
Effect: Rewards are rolled 1 additional time, choosing the rarest result

Name: Mirror Image
Mod: Monster can create illusions of itself
Effect: Rewards are rolled 2 additional times, choosing the rarest result

Name: Storm Strider
Mod: Monster leaves Shocking Ground in its wake and spawns Lightning Mirages when hit. Minions create Storm Bearers on death

Name: Mana Siphoner
Mod: Monster is surrounded by a ring that deals Lightning Damage over time as well as draining Mana
Effect: Rewards are rolled 1 additional time, choosing the rarest result

Name: Corrupter
Mod: Monster inflicts Corrupted Blood on Hit and when Hit. Minions create Corrupted Bubbles on death
Effect: Items dropped from the Monster and its Minions are Corrupted

Name: Invulnerable
Mod: Monster and its Minions periodically become immune to all Damage. Minions cannot die while Monster is alive

Name: Crystal-skinned
Mod: Monster triggers the creation of Crystals when hit. Crystals explode when the Monster dies

Name: Empowered Elements
Mod: Monster cycles between imbued damage of a particular type and immunity to all other damage types
Effect: Rewards are rolled 1 additional time, choosing the rarest result

Name: Effigy
Mod: Monster creates an Effigy of the player. Damage dealt to the Effigy is also reflected to the bonded player
Effect: Rewards are rolled 1 additional time, choosing the rarest result

Name: Lunaris-touched
Mod: Monster uses the abilities of Lunaris
Effect: All Reward Types have an additional reward

Name: Solaris-touched
Mod: Monster uses the abilities of Solaris
Effect: All Reward Types have an additional reward

Name: Arakaali-touched
Mod: Monster uses the abilities of Arakaali
Effect: All Reward Types are Divination Cards

Name: Brine King-touched
Mod: Monster uses the abilities of the Brine King
Effect: Rewards are rolled 6 additional times, choosing the rarest result

Name: Tukohama-touched
Mod: Monster uses the abilities of Tukohama
Effect: Rewards are rolled 4 additional times, choosing the rarest result

Name: Abberath-touched
Mod: Monster uses the abilities of Abberath
Effect: Rewards are rolled 4 additional times, choosing the rarest result

Name: Shakari-touched
Mod: Monster uses the abilities of Shakari
Effect: All Reward Types are Uniques

Name: Innocence-touched
Mod: Monster uses the abilities of Innocence
Effect: All Reward Types are Currency

Name: Kitava-touched
Mod: Monster uses the abilities of Kitava
Effect: Rewards are doubled
